biotools.summary: ExoDIVERISTY is a tool that can be used to resolve diverse protein-DNA footprints from exonuclease based ChIP experiments such as ChIP-exo or ChIP-nexus.

bioschemas.name: ExoDiversity
bioschemas.summary: ExoDIVERISTY is a tool that can be used to resolve diverse protein-DNA footprints from exonuclease based ChIP experiments such as ChIP-exo or ChIP-nexus.
